name: HSP_BDC_DENIED_DATES
description: This table stores the Denied Days start and end dates.

columns.name: BDC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the denial or correspondence record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENIED_START_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the start date for a denied date range for the denial record.

columns.name: DENIED_END_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the end date for a denied date range for the denial record.
